jcr:content.awardReq1: Earned Gold Award for a Science, Technology, Engineering or Math (STEM) related project Plans to pursue a career in STEM Graduating Seniors See additional requirements on application
jcr:content.contact: Interested applicants should contact their local Girl Scout Council. Applications will be distributed and collected by local Girl Scout councils in January and February.
jcr:content.contactTitle: Councils contact Mona Lipson at Girl Scouts of the USA
